page.title: 20 RECREATION.
page.content: Amersham swimming pool was opened in 1967.There are two pools, an adult and a learner, catering for a maximum of300 swimmers at any one time.Between April 1984 and March1985 70,000 people had used the pools.The cost at present is 80p for an adult and 35p for children.The money does not cover all the costs of the pool so money from the rates makes up shortfall. The temperature of the pool is 84 degrees fahreinheit.The pool opens late twice a week closing at 10 pm.Besides swimmming tennis, squash and a sauna are provided. Clubs available are Amersham diving club,Amersham swimming club;Amersham gym club;Chiltern flipper and Red Cross swimming for the disabled.
